endpoints.name: Returns all contacts
endpoints.description: Returns all MYOB Essentials contacts

pathParameters.name: Business UID
pathParameters.description: Unique business identifier in the form of a guid.

queryParameters.name: Include Balances
queryParameters.description: Will include calculated balance fields in the response. Eg ?includeBalances=true

queryParameters.name: Active
queryParameters.description: Will filter the results on the active field. Eg ?active=true

queryParameters.name: Type
queryParameters.description:
Will filter the results on the type field. Eg. ?type=Supplier. Valid combinations are: 
 * Customer
* Supplier
* Other,
* Customer,Supplier

pathParameters.description: Unique contact identifier in the form of a guid.

endpoints.name: Returns all items
endpoints.description: Returns all MYOB Essentials Inventory items

pathParameters.name: Business UID
pathParameters.description: Unique business identifier in the form of a guid.

queryParameters.name: Sold
queryParameters.description: Will filter the results on the sold field for sellable items. Eg. ?sold=true (Value: true and false)

queryParameters.name: Active
queryParameters.description: Will filter the results on the active field. Eg ?active=true

queryParameters.name: Q
queryParameters.description: Will search the results on either item name or item number field which contains the search key. Eg. ?q=key

endpoints.name: Returns all accounts
endpoints.description: Returns all MYOB Essentials accounts

pathParameters.name: Business UID
pathParameters.description: Unique business identifier in the form of a guid.

queryParameters.name: Active
queryParameters.description: will filter the results on the active field. Eg ?active=true

queryParameters.name: Type
queryParameters.description: will filter the results on the type field. Eg. ?type=1 (Value: "1" indicates Banking type, "9" indicates Income type and "11" indicates Expense type)

endpoints.name: Returns account balances for the current financial year
endpoints.description: Returns account balances for the current financial year

pathParameters.name: Business UID
pathParameters.description: Unique business identifier in the form of a guid.

endpoints.name: Returns account balances for a specified date range
endpoints.description: Get account balance for specified range for a MYOB Essentials business

pathParameters.name: Business UID
pathParameters.description: Unique business identifier in the form of a guid.

queryParameters.name: From Date
queryParameters.description: The {from_date} and {to_date} parameters specify the date range for which account balances are calculated. Both {from_date} and {to_date} must be within the same financial year for the business and have the format: yyyy-MM-dd.

queryParameters.name: To Date
queryParameters.description: The {from_date} and {to_date} parameters specify the date range for which account balances are calculated. Both {from_date} and {to_date} must be within the same financial year for the business and have the format: yyyy-MM-dd.

endpoints.name: Returns the accounting properties pertaining to financial year
endpoints.description: Returns the accounting properties pertaining to financial year, conversion date and lock date

pathParameters.name: Business UID
pathParameters.description: Unique business identifier in the form of a guid.

queryParameters.name: Status
queryParameters.description: will filter the results on the status field. Eg. ?status=OPEN

queryParameters.name: Contact UID
queryParameters.description: will filter the results on the contact uid field. Eg. ?contact=1234
